loader.query: select e from tsadv$PersonDocument e where e.personGroup.id = :personGroup and e.startDate <= :systemDate and e.endDate >= :systemDate
select e from tsadv$PersonEducation e where e.personGroup.id = :personGroup and e.startDateHistory <= :systemDate and e.endDateHistory >= :systemDate
select e from tsadv_ImprovingProfessionalSkills e where e.personGroup.id = :personGroup and e.startDateHistory <= :systemDate and e.endDateHistory >= :systemDate
select e from tsadv$PersonQualification e where e.personGroup.id = :personGroup and e.startDateHistory <= :systemDate and e.endDateHistory >= :systemDate
select e from tsadv$PersonExperience e where e.personGroup.id = :personGroup and e.startDateHistory <= :systemDate and e.endDateHistory >= :systemDate
select e from tsadv$Beneficiary e where e.personGroup.id = :personGroup and e.startDateHistory <= :systemDate and e.endDateHistory >= :systemDate
select e from tsadv$Address e where e.personGroup.id = :personGroup
select e from tsadv$PersonContact e where e.personGroup.id = :personGroup
select e from tsadv_PersonLanguage e where e.personGroup.id = :personGroup
select e from tsadv$Awards e where e.personGroup.id = :personGroup and e.startDateHistory <= :systemDate and e.endDateHistory >= :systemDate
select e from tsadv$MilitaryForm e where e.personGroup.id = :personGroup and e.startDateHistory <= :systemDate and e.endDateHistory >= :systemDate
select e from tsadv$Retirement e where e.personGroupExt.id = :personGroup and e.startDateHistory <= :systemDate and e.endDateHistory >= :systemDate
select e from tsadv_PersonBenefit e where e.personGroup.id = :personGroup and e.startDateHistory <= :systemDate and e.endDateHistory >= :systemDate
select e from tsadv_PersonRelativesHaveProperty e where e.personGroup.id = :personGroup
select e from tsadv_PersonBankDetails e where e.personGroup.id = :personGroup and e.startDateHistory <= :systemDate and e.endDateHistory >= :systemDate
